name: Bloodtainted Greatsword

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 15%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 18%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 21%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 24%.

description: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.
